fire radiative power computed from MWIR channels (S7 and F1, depending on the used_channel) and associated with detected SWIR fires

fire radiative power total uncertainty computed from SWIR channels
transmittance of path to fire computed from SWIR channels (S6 channel)
ratio of the radiances measured in S5 and S6 indicating whether the AF pixel detection is likely to be from a vegetation fire or a gas flare (Values sup. or equal to to 0.9)
this flag indicates if this fire has been detected using both S6 and S5 radiances (equal to 1) or only using S6 (value = 0)
hotspot classification code

s5 Fire pixel radiance

average S6 background window radiance used in the FRP equation.
projected area of detector IFOV on surface
total column water vapour above fire
